name: Hydronaut
description:
Hydronaut is a game about a divers journey to the bottom of the ocean in search of the rare teracoins. 

Be careful though, the sea is a dangerous place and the more coins you collect the faster you'll fall!

made in <48 hours for LD40

if you would like to rate my game, here is the link! (would be super appreciated) 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/hydronaut


hidden keys: F4 to resize window, ESC to quit.

follow me on twitter: @terakorp !
